title: Motokano to no Jirettai Gisou Kekkon - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Ecchi   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Arranged Marriage   Beautiful Female Lead   Childhood Love   Cohabitation   Cute Protagonist   Dense Protagonist   First Love   Forced Marriage   Hard-Working Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Misunderstandings   Pretend Lovers   Secret Crush   Secrets   Stubborn Protagonist
author: Nozomi Kota   望公太
description:
'Really, why do I have to be married to you?'

'That's my line.'

Due to the Isurugi family's circumstances, Haru has to enter into a marriage of convenience with his former girlfriend and childhood friend, Tamaki Rio. Living together under the same roof, they planned to live their lives together in indifference and formality... Though in reality, the two still have lingering feelings for each other.

'O-Oh no... If Haru’s this close to me... my feelings for him will...'

'There's no way I can let her find out that I’m still not over her. '

While desperately pretending that they had given up on each other, their awareness and consciousness of the other continuously grows. This is the story of a fake marriage with a former couple's love gradually reigniting.>
